comment.author: 41675580@N08
comment._content: A nice 'close in' shot, very interesting picture of the old ship, thank you for sharing.

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: The Tsesarevich (Цесаревич) was a battleship of the Imperial Russian Navy, built in France by Compagnie des Forges et Chantiers de la Méditerranée à la Seine. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russian_battleship_Tsesarevich
